title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, June 29, 2021
description: Today in the year 1900 French writer and aviator Antoine de Saint-Exupéry was born in France (1900). A pilot turned writer of the  children’s novella, “Le Petit Prince.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today in the year 1900 French writer and aviator Antoine de Saint-Exupéry was born in France (1900). A pilot turned writer of the  children’s novella, “Le Petit Prince.”
